++Imladril
She is the elected Queen of the [Viharani]. She is also [[Durathror][Durathror's]] sister. Her consort is [Iskandor]. She looks about 16 years old.
She acts as [Danny] and [[Nalini][Nalini's]] mentor.
Colors:green, yellow, purple and white (same as Durathror)
Height 4'9" (145cm) Copper skin, gold hair, green eyes. Skilled healer. She is about 800 years old. Has given birth to 18 children, youngest, a girl of 20, lives with her and Iskandor.

Her skin is coppery, her hair like spun gold, braided into perhaps fifty braids, each one strung with a number of coloured beads. Her eyes are leaf green. She was wearing knee high boots and a tartan skirt in shades of green with some reds and blues overlaid. She also wore a laced bodice with sleeves that were gathered at mid forearm. The bodice was heavily embroidered. She looked about sixteen years of age.
